[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ background_color=”#000000″][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,3_4″ admin_label=”Trevor” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” max_width=”80%” use_custom_width=”on” width_unit=”off”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://blackhornvc.com/wp-content/uploads/Blackhorn-Ventures-About-Us-Brittany-Witucky-Finance-and-Operations-Manager-V2.jpg” alt=”Blackhorn Ventures About Us — Brittany Witucky – Finance and Operations Manager – V2″ title_text=”Blackhorn Ventures About Us — Brittany Witucky – Finance and Operations Manager – V2″ align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”HeadShot” _builder_version=”4.9.10″]

 

[/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ text_text_color=”#7dcbb6″ header_text_color=”#ffffff” header_2_text_color=”#ffffff”]

Brittany Witucky

Finance and Operations Manager 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Bio” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ text_text_color=”#ffffff” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]

Brittany joined Blackhorn Ventures in July 2021. In her role as Finance and Operations Manager, Brittany splits her time between overseeing the fund administrators, in order to ensure timely and accurate reporting to LPs, and handling Blackhorn’s internal finance and HR needs.

Prior to her role at Blackhorn, Brittany worked as a controller for various organizations, where she managed the finance and accounting functions of the company while supervising small accounting teams. Brittany also spent a significant portion of her career working for a Family Office focused on real estate investments. Brittany’s role was focused on financial reporting both to internal board members as well as outside investors.

Brittany is a CPA licensed in the state of Colorado and received a master’s degree in finance from Northeastern University. She currently resides in Golden, CO with her husband, daughter, and two Golden Retrievers. In her spare time, Brittany loves to cook, spend time outdoors and practice yoga and Pilates.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_button button_url=”/team/” button_text=”Back To Full Team” button_alignment=”center” admin_label=”Back to Team Button” _builder_version=”3.17.6″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”24px” button_text_color=”#7dcbb6″ button_border_width=”0px” button_border_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_icon=”%%41%%”]

 

[/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”Footer and Social Icons” _builder_version=”3.18.7″ background_color=”#000000″ max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”100%” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||-30px|” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”20px||20px||true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”” border_width_top=”0.3px” border_color_top=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” border_style_top=”none” global_module=”1056″][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_6,1_6,1_6″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ module_class=”ds-vertical-align” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Based in Boulder” _builder_version=”4.5.3″ text_font=”|600|||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” header_6_text_color=”#7dcbb6″ header_6_font_size=”15px” header_6_line_height=”1.6em” custom_margin=”10px||”]
